SEARCH

Class DbLibrary

java.lang.Object
DbLibrary
public class DbLibrary extends Object
SQLite-backed library for game records.

Same API as the in-memory Library, but data lives in an SQLite DB. This class owns the JDBC connection string, ensures the table exists, and keeps an in-memory snapshot synced with the DB for fast reads.

Role in the system: data access layer for the CLI/Swing apps. All persistence work (insert/update/delete/query) flows through here.

Usage: construct with a file path and call the CRUD methods. The constructor will create the table if needed and load rows.

  • Constructor Details

    • DbLibrary

      public DbLibrary(String sqliteFilePath)
      Build a DB-backed library for the given SQLite file. Ensures schema exists and loads current rows into memory.
      Parameters:
      sqliteFilePath - path to the SQLite database file (created if missing)

  • Method Details

    • listAll

      public List<Game> listAll()
      Returns all games as an unmodifiable view.
      Returns:
      immutable list of games currently loaded

    • add

      public String add(Game game)
      Add a game if its id is unique; persists to DB and updates memory.
      Parameters:
      game - fully-populated Game to insert
      Returns:
      status string describing the result (success or error message)

    • remove

      public String remove(int id)
      Remove a game by id; deletes from DB and in-memory list.
      Parameters:
      id - unique identifier of the game to remove
      Returns:
      status string describing the result

    • updateField

      public String updateField(int id, String field, String newValue)
      Update a single field on a game and persist only that column. Valid fields: name, platform, status, priority, ownership.
      Parameters:
      id - game id to update
      field - column name to change
      newValue - new value (parsed/validated per field)
      Returns:
      status string describing the result

    • importFromFile

      public String importFromFile(Path path)
      Bulk-import from a UTF-8 text file with pipe-separated columns: id|name|platform|status|priority|ownership. Comments start with #. Skips invalid/duplicate rows, batches inserts, and commits once.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the source text file
      Returns:
      import summary with counts

    • findById

      public Optional<Game> findById(int id)
      Find a game by id from the in-memory snapshot.
      Parameters:
      id - game id
      Returns:
      Optional containing the game if found

    • scoreFor

      public int scoreFor(Game game)
      Compute the backlog score for a game. Higher means “tackle sooner.” Priority is weighted x2; status adds a small bias.
      Parameters:
      game - target game
      Returns:
      score used for ranking

    • backlogReport

      public String backlogReport(int topNumber)
      Build a quick backlog health summary plus the top Number items to focus on.
      Parameters:
      topNumber - how many items to list (capped by total size)
      Returns:
      formatted report
